name: MiniOne Racing
description: Admit it â€” when you were a kid you used the floor, carpet, walls, bathtub and even the dirt in your backyard to race your mini cars; didn't you? Well those days are back and this time Mom won't be yelling at you for making a mess.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/XP Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible 32 MB graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: Horrible micromachine rip off game. Don't bother, there's much better alternatives on steam that aren't a waste of your time, like Toybox Turbos.  Get that instead, it's just a buck or more than this atrocity (during the summer sale) and well worth it.
